Aziz Lumi√®re Settings
/* user preferences strings */ Setting validation error
main_job_interval 5000 Service interval Interval (in milliseconds) between each luminosity processing service interval must be an integer service interval must be greater than 0 ms
aggregate_sensor_values true Aggregate sensor values Derive brightness from multiple sensor reads
buffer_size 6 Aggregation buffer size buffer size must be an integer buffer size must be greater than 0
min_aggregation_window 1000 Minimum aggregation window Minimum time (in milliseconds) to wait for sensor events before brightness calculation minimum aggregation window must be an integer minimum aggregation window must be greater or equal to 0
base_standard_deviation 1.5 Base standard deviation threshold Base buffer standard deviation threshold to reach before brightness calculation. Set to 256 to disable. max standard deviation must be a decimal number max standard deviation must be greater or equal to 0
extra_standard_deviation 7.0 Extra standard deviation threshold Extra fluctuating margin (scaled to the buffer values heights) added to the base standard deviation threshold. This margin increases the acceptable threshold as higher (thus more spread out) illumination values fill the buffer. Set to 0 to disable. extra standard deviation threshold must be a decimal number extra standard deviation threshold must be greater or equal to 0
